entry.title: Treatment effect
entry.content:
This post is about the different types of treatment effect

Types of treatment effect

  • Average Treatment Effects
  • Conditional Average Treatment Effects
  • Intent-to-Treat Effects
  • Complier Average Treatment Effects
  • Population and Sample Average Treatment Effects
  • Average Treatment Effects on the Treated and the Control
  • Quantile Average Treatment Effects
  • Mediation Effects
  • Log-Odds Treatment Effects
  • Attributable Effects

Inferring the cause of something has been described as:

...reason[ing] to the conclusion that something is, or is likely to be, the cause of something else
entry.summary: presentation of different types of treatment effects
